flirtation.translation[0].definitions[0]: a short period of time during which you are interested in something
He started his own business last year, after a brief flirtation with political life.
flirtation.translation[0].definitions[1]: behaviour that shows you are attracted to someone sexually
She had no objection to a little mild flirtation.
flirtation.translation[0].definitions[2]: a short sexual relationship which is not serious
She had a brief flirtation with Tim.
